answerText: Winesburg, Ohio[10] Winesburg, Ohio is by this American author, who purportedly died from an infection caused by swallowing a toothpick.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Editors 2 | 2 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Doctor Parcival refuses to attend to a dead child in this work's story "The Philosopher". For 10 points each:  [10] Name this work that opens with the section of "The Book of the Grotesque" and features the recurring character of George Willard.
